title: What’s Ahead for Global Economies and Markets in 2022?
description: Global economies and markets are facing a more complicated landscape amid rising rates, slowing growth and shifting monetary and fiscal policies. Goldman Sachs’ Jan Hatzius and Dominic Wilson examine what’s in store for 2022. Dates Recorded: November 23rd and 29th, 2021.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
